page.title: 14Annual Events.
page.content: {School Sports Day}attract our families who come to watch us doing different sporting events. There are many{summer fetes}in the villages supported by many{clubs}and {organisations}who raise money for various charities. Every year through the village of Stansted usually in June thousands of people join together and parade through the streets in procession.The {Carnival}is made up of many colourful and spectacular floats designed and made by various clubs and groups in the village.The procession finally comes to a climax at the local secondary school where there can be found many stalls,side-shows and various other numerous activities. Every{Christmas}children and their parents celebrate the time of year by singing carols around the villages.
